thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 732
thread.title: COLIN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by COLIN

author: COLIN
title: COLIN
text: The car was supurb, quiet, functional, and drove well. The only problem I had was understanding the system for the GPS. My only comment to improve this frustration, is that you have a step by step correct procedure card on how you set it up correctly in the car or with the GPS unit. Once the lovely lady had explained it to me for the second time bit by bit, it worked perfectly. I will certainly hire from you again and so will the rest of our family.Next time we will book it ahead on the Internet, so we get it cheaper.
